description: Manage firewall rules for a server.

commands.name: az mysql flexible-server firewall-rule create
commands.summary: Create a new firewall rule for a flexible server.
examples: az mysql flexible-server firewall-rule create --resource-group testGroup --name testserver --rule-name allowip --start-ip-address 107.46.14.221
az mysql flexible-server firewall-rule create --resource-group testGroup --name testserver --rule-name allowiprange --start-ip-address 107.46.14.0 --end-ip-address 107.46.14.221
az mysql flexible-server firewall-rule create --resource-group testGroup --name testserver --start-ip-address 0.0.0.0

commands.name: az mysql flexible-server firewall-rule delete
examples: az mysql flexible-server firewall-rule delete --rule-name testRule --resource-group testGroup --name testserver
az mysql flexible-server firewall-rule delete --rule-name testRule --resource-group testGroup --name testserver --yes

commands.name: az mysql flexible-server firewall-rule list
commands.summary: List all firewall rules for a flexible server.
examples: az mysql flexible-server firewall-rule list --resource-group testGroup --name testserver
az mysql flexible-server firewall-rule list --resource-group testGroup --name testserver --output table

commands.name: az mysql flexible-server firewall-rule show
commands.summary: Get the details of a firewall rule.
examples: az mysql flexible-server firewall-rule show --rule-name testRule --resource-group testGroup --name testserver

commands.name: az mysql flexible-server firewall-rule update
examples: az mysql flexible-server firewall-rule update --resource-group testGroup --name testserver \ --rule-name allowiprange --start-ip-address 107.46.14.1
az mysql flexible-server firewall-rule update --resource-group testGroup --name testserver \ --rule-name allowiprange --start-ip-address 107.46.14.2 --end-ip-address 107.46.14.218
